ai-tha-ap359:1.4_0: in my presence I went to a good place.
ai-tha-ap359:2.3_0: and after giving him salty purgatives,
ai-tha-ap359:2.4_0: I’ll rejoice in heaven for an eon.’
ai-tha-ap359:3.2_0: of the one who bears the waterless cloth,
ai-tha-ap359:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap359:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sumedhā.
ai-tha-ap359:6.1_0: The seventh section on the Divine Commentaries
